Race.SpecificTitle: Fifth Ward Fire Protection District No. 1 -- 4.5 Mills Renewal - BOC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Fifth Ward Fire Protection District No. 1 Proposition 
(Tax Renewal)
Race.FullText: Shall Fifth Ward Fire Protection District No. 1 of the Parish of Morehouse, State of Louisiana (the "District"), be authorized to continue to levy a four and one-half (4.5) mills tax on all the property subject to taxation in the District (an estimated $57,600 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2020 and ending with the year 2029, for the purpose of training personnel, providing emergency medical services as permitted by law and acquiring, improving, maintaining and operating fire protection facilities and equipment in and for the District?
